last_episode_to_air.name: Modern British - Coracle, Oxalis, Hodge and Huggett
last_episode_to_air.overview: Three new restaurant ideas battle for a life-changing investment - a Welsh concept seeking £750k, a seasonal pop-up after £200k, and a zero-waste food stall after £530k.

name: Million Pound Menu
overview: Business series hosted by Fred Sirieix. 12 restaurant concepts seek major investment to launch their brand. Participants try to convince a jury that their new restaurant ideas could work.

episodes.name: Epoch and ShrimpWreck
episodes.overview: Presenter Fred Sirieix welcomes an all-British fine-dining concept, Epoch, and a Scottish street-food trader, ShrimpWreck, selling tempura prawn buns to Manchester. Epoch is seeking £600,000 to open its first restaurant in central London. ShrimpWreck is after £100,000 to open in Scotland.

episodes.name: FINCA and Wholesome Junkies
episodes.overview: Fred Sirieix welcomes FINCA, a Cuban street-food brand, and Wholesome Junkies, a local vegan junk-food idea, to Manchester.

episodes.name: Hollings and the Cheese Wheel
episodes.overview: Fred Sirieix welcomes Hollings, an idea serving British chophouse classics, and The Cheese Wheel, an Italian-inspired fresh pasta stall, with a cheese wheel at its heart, to Manchester. Hollings is looking for £200,000 to open in London's commuter belt. The Cheese Wheel is asking for £500,000.

episodes.name: Greedy Khao and Trap Kitchen
episodes.overview: Fred Sirieix welcomes Trap Kitchen, a soul-food inspired takeaway selling lobster tails, and Greedy Khao, a vegan Thai grab-and-go idea.

episodes.name: Dynasty and Bubble
episodes.overview: Twelve restaurant concepts seek major investment to launch their brand. Fred Sirieix welcomes a bubble and squeak idea and a high-end Korean idea to Manchester.

episodes.name: Black Bear Burger and Naked Dough
episodes.overview: A married couple makes burgers so good, they don't need any gimmicks. Best friends scoop up a sweet American craze: edible cookie dough.

episodes.name: Fast Casual - The Duck Truck, BBQ Dreamz & Jah Jyot
episodes.overview: Three restaurant ideas battle for a life-changing investment - a Filipino food van, a duck stall and an Indian street-food stall.

episodes.name: New Asian - Baba G'S, KraPow, XXVI
episodes.overview: Three new restaurant ideas battle for a life-changing investment - an Indian burger stall, a Thai concept and an Indian-Nepalese pop-up.

episodes.name: New International - MATR, Pilgrim, Blue Caribou Canteen
episodes.overview: Three new restaurant ideas battle for a life-changing investment - a Nordic concept, a New-Spanish supper club and a Quebec diner.

episodes.name: Sustainable - Skaus, Sustainable Food Story, Devi's
episodes.overview: Three new restaurant ideas battle for a life-changing investment - a plant-based concept after £1m, a sustainable cafe asking for £300k, and a Nordic pop-up looking for £210k.

episodes.name: Grab-and-Go - Tiger Bites, Burmese Kitchen, Really Rice
episodes.overview: New restaurant ideas battle for a life-changing investment - a bao bun concept seeking £575k, a Burmese supper club asking for £100k and a vegan rice-bowl stall after £250k.

episodes.name: Modern British - Coracle, Oxalis, Hodge and Huggett
episodes.overview: Three new restaurant ideas battle for a life-changing investment - a Welsh concept seeking £750k, a seasonal pop-up after £200k, and a zero-waste food stall after £530k.
